system.description:
Stealth covers your ability to move unseen and unheard, whether sneaking past guards, hiding from pursuers, or pickpocketing without being noticed.

You make a Stealth test when attempting to conceal your presence, evade detection, or maneuver covertly through hostile territory. Successes can allow you to avoid detection, surprise enemies, or accomplish tasks without drawing attention.

Extra Successes Can Be Used To:

  • Avoid Detection – Slip past guards or bypass surveillance undetected.
  • Ambush – Gain advantage in combat by striking from an unseen position.
  • Conceal Objects – Hide items or contraband on your person without discovery.
  • Eavesdrop – Listen in on conversations or gather intel without being noticed.
  • Navigate Obstacles – Move through challenging terrain or urban environments quietly.
